title: Husires
author: Husires
content: I want a machine learning developer who can design a website (a simple interface with an image upload button), the user uploads the image and uploads an image, the properties of the image are analyzed and then compared to the database, if the image is very similar, it displays the result else server start doing deep learning .Website is a small antique storeNature of images and databases: photos of antiques, statues, old photos, pharaohs, etc., and similar databases.I don't want to go into too many details because we are still developing the idea, but if you have good experience in the field of machine learning / image analysis / deep learning, PM me.Time is 3-4 weeks Max.Payment BTC.we can use any escrow.I've re-posted my previous topic because I think I went into more detail.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Quote from: Husires on July 02, 2022, 05:08:59 PMI want a machine learning developer who can design a website (a simple interface with an image upload button), the user uploads the image and uploads an image, the properties of the image are analyzed and then compared to the database, if the image is very similar, it displays the result else server start doing deep learning .Website is a small antique storeNature of images and databases: photos of antiques, statues, old photos, pharaohs, etc., and similar databases.I don't want to go into too many details because we are still developing the idea, but if you have good experience in the field of machine learning / image analysis / deep learning, PM me.Time is 3-4 weeks Max.Payment BTC.we can use any escrow.I've re-posted my previous topic because I think I went into more detail.Hello Husires, I have no experience with the machine learning field, but I can provide the web interface to upload the images, if you are interested please let me know.In previous works, I have done Bets verifications, Eshops, Engines to report addresses, and some other cool stuff. So, if you find the right guy for machine learning and need a good web developer, I can cover that part of the job.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: seoincorporation on July 03, 2022, 09:08:56 PMIn previous works, I have done Bets verifications, Eshops, Engines to report addresses, and some other cool stuff. So, if you find the right guy for machine learning and need a good web developer, I can cover that part of the job.I found someone doing back-end programming (machine learning) but unfortunately I have very little budget left so I don't think I can pay much to develop the site, if the site is done perfectly I can ask you to design a site according to what I have of money but I can't promise you at this moment.
